text: Hagi ana kumapina meninteti'ma agafama huteno'ma nevanigeno, henkama forehu anante anante'ma hu'za mani'za vanaza vahe'mo'za magore hu'za ana kumapina nona kiza nomanisnage'za, anampina Arapu vahe'mo'za seli nonkuma'zamia eme ante'za omanigahaze. Ana nehanage'za sipisipi afu kva vahe'mo'za sipisipi afu'zamia anampina atre'nage'za e'za tra'zana onegahaze.
